Name: Formula XD
About the game: Formula XD is a racing team strategy game that puts you in the role of manager - hiring drivers, negotiating contracts with sponsors and engine suppliers, and making the big decisions necessary to keep your team above water. You'll issue orders to your drivers when they go out onto the track, and be responsible for guiding them to victory or defeat. You'll start at the back of the field and fight your way through a ten-season career, striving to win the Constructors' Championship title, or at least make it to the Wall of Fame. There'll be plenty of challenges along the way - not only will you be adjusting your drivers’ fuel and tyre strategy in response to ever-changing race circumstances, you’ll also have to deal with extreme weather, sabotage, stray animals, food poisoning, and even terrorism. Can you manage? Racing circuits set all over the world Loads of drivers, sponsors and engine suppliers Bright, colourful aesthetics Vibrant audio and an energetic synth soundtrack Get hired, buy a team, sell out, switch teams, it's up to you Special abilities and game modifiers shake it up Filled to the brim with puntastic humour
